title: MenuTab Pro for Facebook v5.6 – Provides real-time Facebook access from your menu bar

title: Ondesoft ScreenCapture v1.16.4 – Screen capture utility
content: Ondesoft ScreenCapture is currently the most powerful screen grabbing utility on Mac OS, by which you can easily capture any part on your Mac desktop such as rectangular or ellipse region, freehand region, full screen, active window or all windows from any webpage or application and so on. title: Temperature Gauge v4.0 – Monitor your Mac’s temperature sensors and fan speeds
content: Temperature Gauge lets you monitor all the temperatures and fan speeds inside your Mac. With over 500 international five star ratings and world class support, it’s a great tool for every Mac user to have. – Run in background mode with the info displayed in the menu bar. – See the temperature values in either […]

title: Socialite v1.5.2 – Creates a single interface for multiple social websites
content: Socialite is a revolutionary social application. It seamlessly integrates many social websites, including Flickr, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, RSS and Google Reader. It allows you to interact with them and receive notifications, all from a stunning user interface.   WHAT’S NEW Version 1.5.2: UPDATE: If you already have 1.5 and are notified of an update, please […]

title: Quick Tunes v1.2 – Control iTunes from the menu bar
content: Quick Tunes lets you quickly and easily control your music playing in iTunes from the menu bar. It shows the artwork, name and artist in the menu heading so that you can always quickly see what is playing. Player controls for play/pause, skip and previous track can also be included right in the status bar […]

title: Hibari v1.5.6 – Powerful Twitter client with tweet filtering and user muting
content: Hibari is a powerful Mac Twitter app that blocks annoyances and reveals gems. Block Keywords: Hibari blocks tweets you don’t want to see based on keywords you choose. You can also block all retweets.     Mute Users: No more stressing about whether to follow someone-in Hibari, you can temporarily mute any user if their […]

title: Garbage Truck v1.3 – The Mac’s most elegant trash solution
content: Garbage Truck automatically empties your trash for you, saving your time and stopping piles of rubbish from filling your hard drive. Garbage Truck keeps things beautifully simple, but still allowing perfect control over your trash. With Garbage Truck you will never need to empty your trash again. title: Favs 1.2.1 – The app for all your Internet favorites
content: Favs is a favourites manager for all your favourite Web and social media content. After all, if you are using social networks, you are also creating favorites: on Facebook you ‘like’, on Twitter and Google Reader you ‘star’, on Delicious and Pinboard you ‘bookmark’ and so on. title: Lock Screen Plus 2.0 – Secure lock screen with weather forecast
content: Lock Screen Plus is a secure and beautiful lock screen application combining with a weather forecast. title: VideoMark 1.7 – Easily add watermarks to your videos
content: VideoMark is a fully-featured yet easy-to-use video and movie watermark software which can be used to overlay a digital watermark for video protection or placing a logo for branding your products.
